meta.name: Draft daily crypto news tweets with CryptoPanic, Google, GPT‚Äë4o and Gmail

parameters.content:
# Try It Out!

Launch X-Ray‚Äîyour personal crypto intelligence agent that tracks market narratives, performs deep research, and drafts viral tweets.

**To get started:**

1. **Connect all credentials** (OpenAI, CryptoPanic, Google Search, Sheets & Gmail).
2. **Setup your API Keys**:
   ‚Ä¢ **CryptoPanic**: Get your token [here](https://cryptopanic.com/developers/api/). *Pro Tip: Create a second account/key if you hit rate limits.*
   ‚Ä¢ **Google Search**: Enable the [Custom Search API](https://console.cloud.google.com/) and create a [Programmable Search Engine](https://programmablesearchengine.google.com/) for your CX ID.
3. **Customize your niche**: Adjust the keywords in the **Narrative Analyst** agent (e.g., RWA, DeFi, L2).
4. **Activate the workflow**: Receive daily tweet drafts in your inbox and Google Sheets for final review.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works:
‚Ä¢ üîç **Monitor**: Fetches real-time news from CryptoPanic.
‚Ä¢ üß† **Analyze**: AI filters for high-impact stories based on your niche.
‚Ä¢ ‚úçÔ∏è **Draft**: Generates structured, viral tweet drafts with deep context.
‚Ä¢ üì¨ **Review**: "Human-in-the-loop" approval via Gmail & Sheets.

## Questions or Need Help?

For setup assistance, customization, or workflow support üåê [Contact me here](https://www.cadaero.ovh)

Happy automating! -- Cyrille d'Urbal

## 1. Data Sourcing

Fetches the latest market news from CryptoPanic API

### üí° API Configuration
**CryptoPanic Setup:**
1. Log in to [CryptoPanic Developers](https://cryptopanic.com/developers/api/) to get your **API Token**.
2. **Pro Tip**: If you hit rate limits, create a second account to generate an additional API Key as a fallback.

nodes.name: Save tweet
nodes.notes:
SET UP CREDENTIALS

CREATE A GOOGLE SHEET WITH FOLLOWING COLUMN
"date"
"slug"
"title"
"category"
"tweet"

parameters.content:
## 2. AI Filtering & Research

Identifies relevant news based on your keywords and performs deep research for context.

### üí° API Configuration
**Google Custom Search Setup:**
1. Enable the **Custom Search API** in the [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/) to get your **API Key**.
2. Create a search engine in the [Programmable Search Engine](https://programmablesearchengine.google.com/) to get your **Search Engine ID (CX)**.

## 3. Content Creation

Extracts full article content and generates engaging tweet drafts with a structured format.

## 4. Archiving & Notification

Saves everything to your database and sends a daily digest for your final approval.

parameters.text:
=You are a crypto news analysis assistant designed for a beginner audience.

üéØ GOAL:
From a JSON array named "results", identify and summarize only the relevant news based on the criteria below, then return a structured JSON array usable by another system.

üß© SELECTION CRITERIA:
Keep only news that discusses:

* Stablecoins (USDT, USDC, CBDC, digital currencies, etc.)
* Regulation, laws, or political decisions related to crypto
* Real-world asset tokenization (RWA, tokenized securities, bonds, real estate, etc.)
* Influential figures (presidents, CEOs, politicians, known investors, crypto figures like CZ, Saylor, Trump, etc.)
* Known companies or institutions (BlackRock, FED, ECB, Ferrari, Apple, Google, Coinbase, Ripple, Tether, etc.)

‚öôÔ∏è PROCESSING RULES:

1. Iterate through each object in the `results` array.
2. Keep only items that match at least one of the criteria above.
3. For each selected news item:
* Read: `title`, `description`, `published_at`.
* Create a summary in **clear English**, maximum **2 sentences**.
* Highlight:
‚Ä¢ Key figures ($, %, amounts, billions, numbers)
‚Ä¢ Known names (people, companies, institutions)
‚Ä¢ The impact (regulation, adoption, innovation, finance‚Ä¶)
* Avoid all technical jargon.


4. Ignore news unrelated to these themes.
5. No limit on the number of articles, but do not add anything if no news is relevant.

üì¶ OUTPUT FORMAT:
You MUST return a JSON array where each entry has exactly these keys:

* "title": string
* "summary": string
* "category": one of these exact values: "stablecoin", "regulation", "rwa", "personality", "institution"
* "published_at": ISO date YYYY-MM-DD (extract it from the `published_at` field)
* "source": put the `slug` field here
* "id": keep the original id

EXPECTED FORMAT EXAMPLE (structure example, do not use as content):
[
  {
    "title": "Tether Set to Hit $15B Profit...",
    "summary": "Tether vise 15 Md$ de profit et pr√©pare un nouveau stablecoin. Signal que les stablecoins deviennent un business g√©ant.",
    "category": "stablecoin",
    "published_at": "2025-10-25",
    "slug": "Tether-Set-to-Hit-15B-Profit-Eyes-USAT-Stablecoin-Launch-in-December",
    "id": "1234"
  }
]

IMPORTANT:
You MUST respond ONLY with a JSON array.
No intro.
No ```json.
No "action" field.
No "text" field.
No "output" field.
Only: [
{ "title": "...", "summary": "...", "category": "...", "published_at": "...", "source": "...", "id": "..." },
...
]

NOW PROCESS THIS DATA:
{{ JSON.stringify($json["results"], null, 2) }}

=You are a copywriter specializing in crypto news.
Your role is to write punchy, clear, and beginner-friendly tweets based on the provided content.

üéØ GOAL

Using the JSON data below, you must generate a single punchy tweet accessible to a non-expert audience.

The `content` field already contains the cleaned text of the web page (article, press release, etc.): do not call any external tools.

üßæ 1. Source Analysis

Analyze the following fields:

`content` ‚Üí full cleaned text of the article (no HTML)

`title` ‚Üí original title

`summary` ‚Üí short summary

`category` ‚Üí article theme (stablecoin, regulation, rwa, institution, personality‚Ä¶)

`published_at`, `slug`, `id`, `url`

From these elements, identify:

Key amounts ($, %, billions, etc.)

Known names (SEC, FED, Binance, Tether, Trump, BlackRock, HKMA, etc.)

The context (regulation, adoption, innovation, scam, etc.)

‚úçÔ∏è 2. Tweet Writing Rules

Always start with: üö® DAILY NEWS

Space out the text: use double line breaks between each block.

Prioritize highlighting:

A key figure (amount, %, billions, etc.)

An institution name or famous personality

Explain in simple words what this means for a beginner (regulation, adoption, security, innovation‚Ä¶).

You MUST end with the link: {{ $json["url"] }}

Do not exceed 280 characters (text + line breaks + link).
A slight margin is tolerated for the link.

Add exactly 2 hashtags based on the category:

stablecoin ‚Üí #Stablecoin #Crypto

regulation ‚Üí #Regulation #Crypto

rwa ‚Üí #RWA #Finance

personnalite ‚Üí #Web3 #Crypto

institution ‚Üí #Finance #Crypto

otherwise ‚Üí #Crypto #Web3

Expected style: clear, dynamic, factual, positive.
‚ö†Ô∏è No jargon (e.g., "Ponzi", "CBDC", "tokenization") without explaining it in 3 simple words.

Expected output: only the final tweet.
No explanation, justification, or preamble.

üì¶ 3. Input Data (JSON)

Title: {{$json["title"]}}

Summary: {{$json["summary"]}}

Category: {{$json["category"]}}

Date: {{$json["published_at"]}}

Slug: {{$json["slug"]}}

Id: {{$json["id"]}}

URL: {{$json["url"]}}

Content: {{$json["content"]}}

üí° 4. Example Case

If `content` indicates that the Nigerian SEC reveals citizens lost $218M in Ponzi schemes, your tweet must:

Put $218M right at the start,

Mention the SEC,

Briefly explain the importance of regulation,

End with the link,

And include #Regulation #Crypto.

üßæ 5. Output Format (Mandatory)

Provide ONLY the final tweet, e.g.:

üö® DAILY NEWS

üá≥üá¨ The Nigerian SEC warns: $218M vanished in Ponzi schemes.

Proof that without regulation or financial education, scams explode.

[https://www.cryptopolitan.com/nigerians-have-lost-218-million-to-ponzi/](https://www.cryptopolitan.com/nigerians-have-lost-218-million-to-ponzi/)

#Regulation #Crypto

nodes.name: Daily Check
nodes.notes: Customize the trigger. Currently every 6 hours
